definition: (metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

sentences.english: She's plain doormat, for even every member of her family would treat her like dirt.
sentences.chinese: 她簡直就是個出氣筒，連家裏人都不把她當回事。

sentences.english: Being another person’s emotional punching bag isn’t good for you and it isn’t good for them.
sentences.chinese: 成爲他人的出氣筒對你對他都沒有好處。

sentences.english: What haudio-videoe the kids done to provoke you? Why should you take it out on them?
sentences.chinese: 孩子們沒招你惹你的，你幹嗎拿他們當出氣筒？

sentences.english: I know you are unsatisfied, but don't take it out on me.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你不滿意，但是不要拿我當出氣筒。

sentences.english: She was so angry at her husband that she took it out on her children.
sentences.chinese: 她因和丈夫生氣，就拿孩子來作出氣筒。

sentences.english: I'm not taking spite out on the dog.
sentences.chinese: 我並沒有拿那隻狗當出氣筒。

definition: spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
reckless/extremely daring
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
it's the most capable people who do the most work (idiom) (intended as consolation for the overworked, or flattery when making a request etc)
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party
to use force
sneering/sarcasm/cynical remarks
wordless and silent (idiom); without speaking/taciturn
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to play deaf-mute
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
